column4: sorry upfront for this basic question: is there a good site/howto to set up apache2/php/mysql on 5.10. I've just moved from SuSE and need to get a server running ASAP.
hmmm thanks TiMiDo. but that pretty much is a given.
was hoping for a step by step.
not sure about myaql, but apache2 and php worked out of the box when i installed the packages
